img_above_text:
When Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw is defeated, you'll gain another Tadpole to upgrade your frog Spirit, as well as the Left Hand of Buddha! This means you can now use both hands to craft and purchase a special Immortal Blessing Gourd when you visit the Shen Monkey in the Zodiac Village!
Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw
img_below_text:
You can look for an exit to the boss arena on the far side, which leads to a ledge with a green Wisp, and a drop back down to the main path from the Shrine.
Behind, you'll find the area littered with more Stone Spiders leading back to the Shrine, while ahead a lone Beetle Captain guards a small archway.

content.text:

Behind, you'll find the area littered with more Stone Spiders leading back to the Shrine, while ahead a lone Beetle Captain guards a small archway."

img_summary: The image depicts a player character standing on a rocky ledge in a dark, cavernous environment, holding a fiery weapon. The character appears to be looking down towards a glowing green Wisp, highlighted by a red dashed circle, which signifies a point of interest or a potential path forward. This scene follows the defeat of the boss Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw and precedes the player finding an exit from the boss arena, leading to a new area with more enemies and a path back to the main route. The image serves to illustrate the next steps in the game's progression, guiding the player towards the green Wisp and the subsequent drop to the main path.
